message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $140?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer!  $140 is a bit more than I'm comfortable with at the moment.  Would you be willing to go down to $130?  I think that would be a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $135. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
